DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose present study explore weaning failure rate invasive mechanical ventilation identify risk factor wean failure .
DOC.brief_title: Weaning Outcome From Invasive Mechanical Ventilation
DOC.criteria: Requiring endotracheal intubation invasive mechanical ventilation Duration invasive mechanical ventilation < 48 hours； Presence tracheostomy； Presence upper airway obstruction .
